chat.title: D10
chat.message: for the D10 bolus, consider 100(-200)cc boluses instead of 250cc

chat.title: phenytoin loading dose: not as a bolus
chat.message: IV phenytoin loading dose shouldn't be given as a bolus (infusion over ~30 min, max 50mg/min?). Not sure if this would be in the nursing/admin vs ordering

chat.title: Meds with caps?
chat.message: Looks good overall! Wondering why some meds have caps in the middle vs infusion meds don't.
